item.description:
Hello everyone:
We are concerned that you did not receive our reminder to sign up for next weeks ICC. We are extending our deadline till Saturday, April 19th.

WEB EXPERTS PANEL, Revisited
Bring all of your web production questions! Join us for a question and answers forum featuring Brent Robertson of Fathom, Jim Keiffer of Bright Egg and Steve Yanicke of Hattersworkshop. Suzi Edwards of Wallfymarketing.com will be moderating.

Learn how to better handle web projects. From interfacing with programmers, to presenting concepts and file preparation, as well as coordinating web and print branding.

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE HAS BEEN EXTENDED TO Saturday, April 19th.
You must be paid in accordance with the instructions above before your reservation is considered accepted. Because we have to plan ahead, we need to collect money in advance. If you need to cancel, we will be able to refund your money only if you PHONE Laura Kolk at 860.646.0542 by the end of the day on April 16, so that we can cancel your reservation.

The cost of the event is $24.00 and includes dinner. Please pay via PayPay by 4/16 to: kolkdesign@usa.net. Walk-ins, cash or check are not accepted. When you send your payment, please indicate your meal choice. If you don't indicate a meal choice, your order defaults to vegetarian.

- Veggie pasta
- Herb crusted Basa sole
- Chicken parmagiana

We're looking forward to seeing you there!


Job offers:
Members can post job offerings in PDF format in the "files" section. For current job offerings go to: http://networkmarket....
item.how_to_find_us: Confetti's restuarant is a small venue. Ask for the "ICC" party.
item.why: This is a very casual group of folks. I suggest you come at 6:00 to enjoy the networking.

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: DEADLINE for sign up extended
